Text: The Divide trilogy is a fantasy young adult novel trilogy by Elizabeth Kay, which takes place in an alternate universe.
Triplets:<The Divide trilogy
1:
--------------------
Text: The Divide trilogy:  The three books are "The Divide" (2002), "Back to The Divide" (2005), and "Jinx on The Divide" (2006).
Triplets:<The Divide
2:
--------------------
Text: The Divide trilogy:  The first novel was originally published by the small press publisher Chicken House (now a division of Scholastic), with subsequent volumes published by Scholastic, which also reprinted the first novel.
Triplets:<The Divide trilogy
3:
--------------------
Text: The Divide trilogy:  The books have been translated into French, German, Spanish, Finnish, Chinese, Japanese, Portuguese, Italian, Romanian and Dutch.
